name: fhevm-react-template
description: Universal FHEVM SDK with Next.js example for Zama bounty

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=packages/fhevm-sdk && npm install --workspace=examples/nextjs-carbon-trading
scripts.test:gas: cd examples/carbon-credit-trading && REPORT_GAS=true npx hardhat test
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd examples/carbon-credit-trading && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.mjs --network sepolia
scripts.verify:sepolia: cd examples/carbon-credit-trading && npx hardhat run scripts/verify.mjs --network sepolia
scripts.interact:sepolia: cd examples/carbon-credit-trading && npx hardhat run scripts/interact.mjs --network sepolia
scripts.simulate:sepolia: cd examples/carbon-credit-trading && npx hardhat run scripts/simulate.mjs --network sepolia
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && cd examples/carbon-credit-trading && npx hardhat clean
